**Edited <time datetime="2016-04-05T15:15:53Z" title="04/05/2016 03:15  PM" data-short="8 yr">April 5, 2016</time> by commonnerfer**
  
2.0 realese

Welcome to the forums, commonnerfer.

Please take some time to read the [Add-on Posting Rules](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/87841-Add-on-Posting-Rules-Aug-21st-2014). I've removed the downloads as the license you provided on Curse is not permitted by the original license for the textures (CC-BY-NC-SA-4.0). Before reposting the links, you need to do the following:

- Credit both previous texturers
- Add the correct license to the OP
- Add the correct license everywhere this mod is available for download
- Add the license in the download zip

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-09T16:32:10Z" title="05/09/2015 04:32  PM" data-short="9 yr">May 9, 2015</time> by Master Tao**
  
4.0

I'm sorry about the mix up but i do have a few questions i thought that green skull made the texture if you want me to i can link it in there and i know very little about legal and i though that creative commons was the proper license for this add on to texture replacer

> 
> I'm sorry about the mix up but i do have a few questions i thought that green skull made the texture if you want me to i can link it in there and i know very little about legal and i though that creative commons was the proper license for this add on to texture replacer

 If you don't know about legal I don't advise you to mod. You're more likely to get in trouble than to get people to like you.
Trust me, I made that mistake and I learned from it.

There are several [Creative Commons licenses](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/). Because Green Skull released the textures under a Share-Alike license, you must use exactly the same license. Green Skull modified textures made by another user as you can see in the Credits and Legal section of [her/his OP](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/72115-0-23-5-Green-Skull-Inc-Custom-Design-Spacesuits-v0-38-14th-April-14).
thank you so much for the clarification on what i need to do i will get on to that later to night

so the legal would be something like this Texture replacer is issued with permission from Shaw 

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...%288-3-2014%29](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60961-0-23-TextureReplacer-1-1-%288-3-2014%29)

Distributed under this licence [https://github.com/ducakar/TextureReplacer#licence](https://github.com/ducakar/TextureReplacer#licence)

Original texture design by Proot [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...913#post923913](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60961-0-23-TextureReplacer-1-1-%288-3-2014%29/page34?p=923913#post923913)

All textures are altered by Green skull and distributed under this licence 

[https://creativecommons.org/licenses...4.0/deed.en_US](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/deed.en_US)

then edited by commonnerfer and distributed under this license 

[https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/deed.en_US](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/deed.en_US)

i made that mistake and am now coming back I'm the orginal owner of the common mod pack

i modified configs and got snjo mad at me cause i made on of his props work without his plugin and he told me to remove the prop which was one of the coolest parts of the mod cause it did not require the fire spitter plugin.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-05-10T02:32:53Z" title="05/10/2015 02:32  AM" data-short="9 yr">May 10, 2015</time> by commonnerfer**

> 
> If you don't know about legal I don't advise you to mod. You're more likely to get in trouble than to get people to like you.
> Trust me, I made that mistake and I learned from it.

and that is exactly how patenting destroys innovation

> 
> Original texture design by Proot [http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/...913#post923913](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/60961-0-23-TextureReplacer-1-1-%288-3-2014%29/page34?p=923913#post923913)
> All textures are altered by Green skull and distributed under this licence 
> 
> [https://creativecommons.org/licenses...4.0/deed.en_US](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/deed.en_US)
> 
> then edited by commonnerfer and distributed under this license 
> 
> [https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/deed.en_US](https://creativecommons.org/licenses/by-nc-sa/4.0/deed.en_US)

As long as you're not also redistributing Texture Replacer, this should be all you need. Put that in your post and in the download. Thanks for taking the time to ask whether you'd understood.

> 
> i made that mistake and am now coming back I'm the orginal owner of the common mod pack
> i modified configs and got snjo mad at me cause i made on of his props work without his plugin and he told me to remove the prop which was one of the coolest parts of the mod cause it did not require the fire spitter plugin.

That's because Snjo's license doesn't permit redistribution. You can accomplish the same effect using Module Manager to copy and/or edit the part config and ask users to download the original Firespitter. There's no need to violate Snjo's license.
ok thank you
Installation instructions please? I missed the class on omnipotence.

lol I'm trying to take a screen shot of my new suits and my pc keeps crashing i way over did it they work indvidualy. but apparently more than 10 will crash my computer with the clouds and high part count of plane in the back round so yea fun.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-09T20:54:43Z" title="06/09/2015 08:54  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 9, 2015</time> by commonnerfer**

> 
> That's because Snjo's license doesn't permit redistribution. You can accomplish the same effect using Module Manager to copy and/or edit the part config and ask users to download the original Firespitter. There's no need to violate Snjo's license.

All the more reason for Squad to require a minimum level of open license for all addons in this game. It makes the community more alive, and if you aren't selling the stuff (the main reason for a close license), or closing the source to hide things you dont want others to see (like hiding the fact that you are illegally re-using something in contra to its patent/copyright - and I have seen that in RL!!), there really isnt a good reason not to share so others can build on your work. /stepping-off-soapbox

Anyway, that said, always ask permission - and if its an open license, its common courtesy to let the original know you're doing something, s/he may have plans or something in process to do the same, and you can collaborate!

Seriously can you give any installation instructions???? This is based on another mod but I do not know where to dump these files? I know they go someplace in the texture replacer folder (I am guessing) but you give no instructions on how or where install them???

> 
> Seriously can you give any installation instructions???? This is based on another mod but I do not know where to dump these files? I know they go someplace in the texture replacer folder (I am guessing) but you give no instructions on how or where install them???

Hey Crash, in the TextureReplacer folder, there's a "suits" folder (GameData/TextureReplacer/Suits) and I dropped all of the folders from epic suits (/blue suit, /orange suit, /murica suit etc.) in there, and it worked great.

Hope that helps, and see you soon when we're back up and running!
